name: LatestGeneticsNews
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill aggregates research findings on genetics from around the world. It's an ideal addition to the flash briefing of individuals interested in genetic research. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
